languages.text: {n}Мехадендрит простирается над корчащейся на палубе Нихель, словно длань божества.{/n} "Я не желал этого, техносестра. Но процедура должна завершиться. Прощай". {n}Клешня бережно извлекает увечный, покрытый окалиной нейрокогитатор из головы Медного шепота. Техножрица вздрагивает, и по изуродованному лицу растекается покой.{/n}

{n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендрит простирается над корчащейся на палубе Нихель, словно длань божества.{/n} "Я не желал этого, техносестра. Но процедура должна завершиться. Прощай". {n}Клешня бережно извлекает увечный, покрытый окалиной нейрокогитатор из головы Медного шепота. Техножрица вздрагивает, и по изуродованному лицу растекается покой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechadendrite extended over Nihel, who is convulsing on the deck, is like the hand of a deity.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must end. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, dross-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priestess winces, and peace spreads over her disfigured face.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神の手のごとく、機械触手がデッキに横たわるニヘルに伸びていく。{/n}「このようなことは望んでいなかったのだ、技術同胞よ。だが、手順は完了させなくてはならない。お別れだ」{n}機械触手の爪が、ぐちゃぐちゃに溶解金属で覆われた神経考算機を慎重にブラスウィスパーの頭から引き抜く。技術司祭は身震いし、彼女の変わり果てた顔には安らぎが広がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神の手のごとく、機械触手がデッキに横たわるニヘルに伸びていく。{/n}「このようなことは望んでいなかったのだ、技術同胞よ。だが、手順は完了させなくてはならない。お別れだ」{n}機械触手の爪が、ぐちゃぐちゃに溶解金属で覆われた神経考算機を慎重にブラスウィスパーの頭から引き抜く。技術司祭は身震いし、彼女の変わり果てた顔には安らぎが広がる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}妮赫尔躺在甲板上抽搐着，帕斯卡的机械触须仿佛神明的手一般向她伸去。{/n}“我不想这样，技术姐妹，但这个过程必须完成。永别了。”{n}他的爪子小心翼翼地从铜语头上取下一个被金属渣覆盖的破损沉思者。妮赫尔颤抖了一下，被毁容的脸上随即浮现了平静的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}雅珀躺在甲板上抽搐着，帕斯卡的机械触须像神明的手一样朝她伸去。{/n}“我不想这样，技术姐妹。但进程必须结束。永别了。”{n}他的爪子小心翼翼地从铜语头上取下一个被金属渣覆盖的破损思考器。雅珀颤抖了一下，被毁容的脸上随即浮现了平静的表情。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Telle la main d'une déité, la mécadendrite s'étend vers Nihel qui convulse sur le pont.{/n} « Ce n'est pas ce que je voulais, technoconsœur. Mais cette procédure doit être menée à son terme. Adieu. » {n}Avec autant de délicatesse que possible, il retire un cogitateur neuronal endommagé et couvert de rebut de la tête de Murmecuivre qui tressaille avant de rendre son dernier soupir, son visage défiguré à jamais figé dans une expression apaisée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Telle la main d'une déité, la mécadendrite s'étend vers Nihel qui convulse sur le pont.{/n} « Ce n'est pas ce que je voulais, technoconsœur. Mais cette procédure doit prendre fin. Adieu. » {n}Avec autant de délicatesse que possible, il retire un cogitateur neuronal endommagé et couvert de rebut de la tête de Murmecuivre qui tressaille avant de rendre son dernier soupir, son visage défiguré à jamais figé dans une expression apaisée.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Como la mano de un dios, la mecadendrita se extiende sobre Nihel, que yace convulsionando sobre el suelo de la cubierta.{/n} «No deseaba llegar a esto, tecnohermana, pero el procedimiento debe terminar. Adiós». {n}Su garra retira cuidadosamente un destrozado cogitador neural cubierto de hollín de la cabeza de Susurro de latón. La tecnosacerdotisa hace una mueca y su desfigurada cara se queda finalmente en paz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mecadendrita se extiende como la mano de una deidad sobre Nihel, que yace convulsionando sobre el suelo de la cubierta.{/n} «No deseaba llegar a esto, tecnohermana, pero el procedimiento debe terminar. Adiós». {n}Su garra retira cuidadosamente un destrozado y sucio cogitador neural de la cabeza de Susurro de latón. La tecnosacerdotisa hace una mueca y su desfigurada cara se queda finalmente en paz.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Mechadendrit streckt sich wie die Hand einer Gottheit über Nihel aus, die zuckend an Deck liegt.{/n} "Ich wollte das nicht, Tech-Schwester. Doch die Prozedur muss abgeschlossen werden. Lebt wohl." {n}Seine Klaue entfernt vorsichtig einen zerstörten, rußverschmierten neuralen Cogitator aus Messingflüsterers Kopf. Die Techpriesterin zuckt zusammen, dann legt sich Friede über ihr entstelltes Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mechadendrit streckt sich wie die Hand einer Gott über Nihel aus, die zuckend an Deck liegt.{/n} "Ich wollte das nicht, Tech-Schwester. Doch die Prozedur muss enden. Lebt wohl." {n}Seine Klaue entfernt vorsichtig einen zerstörten, schmieren neuralen Cogitator aus Messingflüsterers Kopf. Die Techpriesterin zuckt zusammen, dann breitet sich auf ihrem entstellten Gesicht Friede aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mekadentrit, güvertede yerde kıvranan Nihel'e bir ilahın eliymişçesine uzanıyor.{/n} "Böyle olsun istemezdim tekno kardeşim ama prosedür tamamlanmalı. Hoşça kal." {n}Pençesi, Pirinçfısıltı'nın başından ezilmiş, is kaplı nöral kavramsayarı dikkatle çıkarıyor. Tekno Rahip sarsılıyor, ardından biçimsiz yüzüne huzurlu bir ifade yerleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like the hand of a deity, the mechadendrite extends over Nihel lying convulsing on the deck.{/n} "I did not want this, tech-sister. But the procedure must be completed. Farewell." {n}His claw carefully removes a mangled, soot-covered neural cogitator from Brasswhisper's head. The Tech-Priest shudders, and peace descends over her disfigured face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekadentrit, güvertede yerde kıvranan Nihel'e bir ilahın eliymişçesine uzanıyor.{/n} "Bunu ben istemedim tekno kardeşim ama prosedür tamamlanmalı. Hoşça kal." {n}Pençesi, Pirinçfısıltı'nın başından ezilmiş, isle kaplanmış nöral kavramsayarı dikkatle çıkarıyor. Tekno Rahip sarsılıyor, ardından biçimsiz yüzüne huzurlu bir ifade yerleşiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
